function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling and integrating data from multiple sources increases the risk of spreading inaccurate or incomplete information.","Impact":"Propagation of misinformation and incorrect data in the knowledge graph, leading to incorrect conclusions and decisions.","Mitigation":"Thorough validation and fact-checking processes, along with the use of standardized data integration protocols.","Technologies":"Data validation tools, data integration platforms, and standardized data extraction and transformation pipelines.","People":"Data scientists, knowledge engineers, and data integration specialists.","Owner":"Organizations that are responsible for maintaining the knowledge graph and data integration processes."},{"Description":"Extraction and integration of unstructured data may lead to the inclusion of irrelevant or outdated information in the knowledge graph.","Impact":"Inclusion of irrelevant or outdated data in the knowledge graph, leading to inaccurate and unreliable insights.","Mitigation":"Regular data curation and cleaning processes, along with the use of machine learning and natural language processing algorithms for relevance assessment.","Technologies":"Data cleaning and curation tools, machine learning models, natural language processing algorithms.","People":"Data curators, domain experts, and data analysts.","Owner":"Organizations responsible for maintaining the knowledge graph and data curation processes."},{"Description":"Lack of semantic understanding in plain texts may result in the extraction of incorrect fact triples, leading to misinformation in the knowledge graph.","Impact":"Incorporation of incorrect facts in the knowledge graph, causing misleading representations of concepts and entities.","Mitigation":"Utilization of advanced natural language processing models and semantic understanding algorithms for fact extraction, along with manual validation by domain experts.","Technologies":"Advanced natural language processing models, semantic understanding algorithms, knowledge representation frameworks.","People":"NLP experts, domain experts, and knowledge engineers.","Owner":"Organizations responsible for the accuracy and integrity of the knowledge graph and its data sources."}]}
